attributes.action: HOUSE VETERANS FIRST Get them care & support BEFORE ANY Refugee or Asylum Seeker
attributes.additional_details:
House Veterans BEFORE ALL Refugees & Asylum Seekers. 

It cannot be right to put foreign nationals ahead of a queue that snakes past up to 10,000 veterans sleeping rough on our streets. 

https://www.hhvuk.org
attributes.background: 20, 000 Foreigners are to be housed and cared for ahead of people who have served this Country and in some instances given everything - mind, body and soul! They need putting back together - They need our help today. Many sacrificed that - Rememberance isn't two minutes in November but every day!

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Fund guaranteed housing for armed forces veterans: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/585941

Cancel the Afghan citizens’ resettlement scheme: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/595224
